text: Chak Jhumra Junction railway station () is located in Chak Jhumra town, Faisalabad district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Punjab, Pakistan Category:Railway stations on Sangla Hill–Kundian Branch Line Category:Railway stations on Khanewal–Wazirabad Line
title: Chak Jhumra Junction railway station
